justification: Notes B’s zero-RB and youth lean superficially but misapplies it by asking for B’s elite rookie WR/TE (youth they value) and ignores B’s ‘buy injured’ tendency. Does recognize B might want a dual‑threat QB, but misses the Week 10 bye conflict (Jake Green and B’s current QB both on bye). Trade is roughly value-coherent but weakly aligned with B’s incentives and roster shape (TE downgrade, WR strength loss). Rationale is generic and not roster-specific; 0.68 accept feels optimistic.
